description: Bootstrap the VM with Node.js, Claude Code CLI, and system packages
steps: SCP bootstrap script to VM: `scp scripts/bootstrap.sh root@{ip}:/root/`
SCP Claude Code prompt to VM: `scp prompts/setup-openclaw.md root@{ip}:/root/`
Execute bootstrap script via SSH: `ssh root@{ip} 'chmod +x /root/bootstrap.sh && /root/bootstrap.sh'`
Verify Node.js installed: `ssh root@{ip} 'node -v'` should return v22.x
Verify Claude Code installed: `ssh root@{ip} 'which claude'` should return path
Verify openclaw user created: `ssh root@{ip} 'id openclaw'` should succeed
Verify UFW enabled: `ssh root@{ip} 'ufw status'` should show active
